lexUnit.name: cite.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: mention (in support of a point)

sentence.text: Researcher Amin Rajan , for one , cites Rome and Constantinople as models of the fragility of cities that become supreme .
Romaine ( 1981 , 1984b ) and Cameron ( 1990 ) , for example , specifically cite our Belfast research as an example of the ` correlational fallacy " .
The American decision cited excessive budgets , poor management and anti-western policies as their grounds for resignation .
Poor growth was cited as a presenting symptom for 31 of the 100 children .
The postponement of the conference was cited as a reason for the extension of the transition period .
Characteristically , he does not cite any source for this assertion .

To the untutored eye , this picture of the personality of the creative individual might seem far distant from that of the psychotic ; it is certainly often cited as evidence against the two being connected .
To Louis Terrenoire , he cited the example of the nineteenth-century statesman Thiers , who had been Louis-Philippe 's minister in 1840 , and returned to power thirty-one years later .
Neumann also cites Jean-Pierre Marty 's deductions about Mozart tempos .
As an example he cites Europe ; his political passion -- just as it would appear to be Mrs Thatcher 's bete noir .
I cited that 1,000-calorie total because , to my knowledge , all adults in normal health and circumstances burn up more than 1,000 calories daily .
The agreement is being cited as a model for other companies working in Third World countries .
Lack of childcare provision was cited as a major obstacle for women who wish to participate in training and employment initiatives .
He cited growing competition from satellite and cable stations as one of the reasons why the rules should be relaxed .
IBM cites rescheduling problems as the reason for the delay .
Recreational damage is cited by the CPRE as being short-term and minimal .
The protection of cetaceans was cited as a priority in the Mediterranean Action Plan at UNEP 's Cairo conference in October 1991 .
